mapper.select: SELECT MB.*, M.*, MBI.filenum, MBI.filename, MI.filenum AS PROFILENUM, MI.filename AS PROFILENAME FROM MEETINGBOARD MB INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON(MB.meetingboardwriter = M.membernum) LEFT JOIN MEETINGBOARDIMAGE MBI ON(MB.meetingboardnum = MBI.meetingboardnum) LEFT JOIN MEMBERIMAGE MI ON(M.membernum = MI.membernum) WHERE MB.meetingboardnum = #{meetingBoardNum}
